## A Day of Connection and Relaxation

After two intensive days of learning and creating, join us for a relaxing social day to strengthen community bonds and enjoy the beautiful Swiss countryside.

## To Bring

- a return train ticket for the S5 train from Zurich HB to Wetzikon ZH (keep the receipt, we will refund it)
- a snack for the morning break
- comfortable shoes for walking
- swimwear if you would like to swim at Badi Seegräben (Pfäffikersee)
